title: Cavendish, Froome, Roglič Headline First Round of Curious Off-Season Criteriums
content:
You know it's off-season when the year-end Asian exhibitions begin. Expect kimonos, martial arts, and very little racing.

Read the full article at Cavendish, Froome, Roglič Headline First Round of Curious Off-Season Criteriums on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
